ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped mixed herbs (e.g. rosemary, thyme, parsley)
1, 750 ml bottle red wine (e.g. Côtes du Rhône)
3 pounds beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes
4-5 each, whole sprigs of thyme, rosemary, and parsley, tied in a bunch or placed in a bouquet garni bag
4 ounces thick-cut bacon, cut into lardons*
1, 28-ounce can whole tomatoes, drained, seeded and chopped
1/2 pound white button mushrooms, halved (or quartered, if large)
buttered egg noodles or potatoes, for serving (optional)
